title: Can you bring us up to date on the planned development along the river between Independence and Sanders--called River Lights, I think? They started clearing land to move River Road before they had the state\'s approval to do so, but work seems to have halted. I can no longer find a web site for the Charlotte developer doing the project. Has the economy halted it? Do they still plan to go forward later? Did they get official approval to move River Road and open it into Lorraine Drive?
